articles.title: How to Generate Software License Keys and Verify Them
articles.description: Learn how to generate software license keys and verify them using a Crypto API. The keys can be activated offline and do not require a database.

tableOfContents.title: 1. Generate Public and Private Key Pair
License Activation in Google Apps Script

content.introduction: You are running a small software business that sells digital downloads - apps, plugins, or even templates. When the buyer completes the purchase, you need to provide them with a license key that they can use to activate and validate the software.

sections.heading: Here's how you can implement such a licensing system in your software:
points: Generate a public and private key pair using the RSA algorithm.
Sign a message with the private key. The message contains the buyer's email address and the software SKU.
The license key is a combination of the message and the signature.
The buyer enters the license key in the software to activate it.
The software verifies the license key using the public key.

sections.heading: The Advantages
sections.content: This approach has several advantages over traditional licensing systems that require a database to store and validate license keys.

articles.title: How to Use Cron Expressions to Create Time Triggers in Apps Script
articles.description: Learn how to use cron expressions to schedule and automate tasks in Google Apps Script. Create complex time-based triggers with ease.

content.introduction: Cron expressions are a powerful way to schedule tasks in Google Apps Script. They allow you to create complex time-based triggers with a simple syntax.

sections.heading: What are Cron Expressions
sections.content: A cron expression is a string consisting of six or seven fields separated by white space that represents a set of times.

articles.title: Useful NPM Tips and Tricks for Developers to Boost Productivity
articles.description: Discover essential NPM commands and tricks that will help you work faster and smarter with Node.js packages.

content.introduction: NPM (Node Package Manager) is an essential tool for JavaScript developers. Here are some tips and tricks to help you work more efficiently.

sections.heading: NPM Command Shortcuts
sections.content: Learn the most useful NPM shortcuts that will save you time every day.

articles.title: Secret Gmail Hack to Find All Bulk Emails in your Inbox
articles.description: Use this secret Gmail search operator to find all unwanted emails that are either newsletters or promotional emails.

content.introduction: Gmail has a hidden search operator that can help you find all bulk emails, newsletters, and promotional messages in your inbox instantly.

sections.heading: The Secret Search Operator
sections.content: Use the 'category:promotions OR category:updates' search operator to find all bulk emails.

articles.title: How to Import Data from One Google Sheet to Another - Learn with Practical Examples
articles.description: Learn how to import data from one Google Sheet to another using the IMPORTRANGE and QUERY functions. You can filter data or only import specific rows that meet certain criteria.

content.introduction: Google Sheets makes it easy to import data from one spreadsheet to another. This tutorial shows you how to use IMPORTRANGE and QUERY functions together.

sections.heading: Using IMPORTRANGE
sections.content: The IMPORTRANGE function allows you to import data from another Google Sheet.

articles.title: How to Link Postal Addresses to Google Maps in Google Sheets
articles.description: Learn how to make postal addresses clickable in Google Sheets with a formula. Create hyperlinks that directly link an address to Google Maps places.

content.introduction: Convert postal addresses in Google Sheets into clickable links that open Google Maps. This simple formula makes it easy to navigate to any address.

sections.heading: The Formula
sections.content: Use the HYPERLINK function combined with the Google Maps URL structure to create clickable address links.
